vwr.project.services.input
Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
  vwr.project.services.input.InputManager

public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages input, takes care of control-mapping. For all the commands/input values, 2 means just-pressed, 3 means just-released, and 1 means still holding on. 0 of course means not being pressed.
